H0.text: What automotive manufacturer's badge logo has since 1925 featured a diamond, mostly as an 'impossible optical illusion' geometric 3D frame. Citroen

A4.text: In 1923 it introduced a new circle-shaped badge, which was replaced by the 'diamond' or lozenge in 1925.
